item.title: Alex add a quote by noah levine
item.description: "Waking up is not a selfish pursuit of happiness, it is a revolutionary stance, from the inside out, for the benefit of all beings in existence." -- noah levine

item.title: Alex add a quote by Noah Levine
item.description: "Sitting still is a pain in the ass." -- Noah Levine

item.title: Alex add a quote by Noah Levine
item.description: "The inner revolution will not be televised or sold on the Internet. It must take place within one's own mind and heart." -- Noah Levine

item.title: Alex add a quote by Noah Levine
item.description: "...I didn't feel like there was anything incompatible with my love of gangster rap and my spiritual aspirations." -- Noah Levine

item.title: Alex add a quote by N.K. Jemisin
item.description: "We can never be gods, after all--but we can become something less than human with frightening ease." -- N.K. Jemisin

item.title: Alex add a quote by N.K. Jemisin
item.description: "Fortunately, where reason failed, blind panic served well enough." -- N.K. Jemisin

item.title: Alex add a quote by N.K. Jemisin
item.description: "There's truth even in tainted knowledge, if one reads carefully." -- N.K. Jemisin

item.title: Alex add a quote by N.K. Jemisin
item.description: "You are Insignificant. One of millions, neither special nor unique. I did not ask for this ignominy, and I resent the comparison. Fine. I don't you like you, either." -- N.K. Jemisin

item.title: Alex add a quote by N.K. Jemisin
item.description: "Love betrayed has an entirely different sound from hatred outright." -- N.K. Jemisin

item.title: Alex add a quote by N.K. Jemisin
item.description: "You are what your creators and experiences have made you, like every other being in this universe. Accept that and be done; I tire of your whining." -- N.K. Jemisin

item.title: Alex add a quote by N.K. Jemisin
item.description: "There is nothing foolish about hope." -- N.K. Jemisin

item.title: Alex add a quote by N.K. Jemisin
item.description: "I am not as I once was. They have done this to me, broken me open and torn out my heart. I do not know who I am anymore. I must try to remember." -- N.K. Jemisin

item.title: Alex add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Alex add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "You can never be overdressed or overeducated." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Alex add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I don't want to go to heaven. None of my friends are there." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Alex add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "A good friend will always stab you in the front." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Alex add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am not young enough to know everything." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Alex add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Every saint has a past, and every sinner has a future." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Alex add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Never love anyone who treats you like you're ordinary." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Alex add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Everything in the world is about sex except sex. Sex is about power." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Alex add a quote by Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche
item.description: "You have your way. I have my way. As for the right way, the correct way, and the only way, it does not exist." -- Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche

item.title: Alex add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "In heaven, all the interesting people are missing." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Alex add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "There are no facts, only interpretations." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Alex add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Faith: not wanting to know what the truth is." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Alex add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Fairy tales are more than true: not because they tell us that dragons exist, but because they tell us that dragons can be beaten." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Alex add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "I hope that in this year to come, you make mistakes. Because if you are making mistakes...you're Doing Something." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Alex add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Because,' she said, 'when you're scared but you still do it anyway, that's brave." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Alex add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Hey," said Shadow. "Huginn or Muninn, or whoever you are." The bird turned, head tipped, suspiciously, on one side, and it stared at him with bright eyes. "Say 'Nevermore,'" said Shadow. "Fuck you," said the raven." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Alex add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "All your questions can be answered, if that is what you want. But once you learn your answers, you can never unlearn them." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Alex add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Even nothing cannot last forever." -- Neil Gaiman
